sub_title: Programmaregisseur  Freedom of Religion & Belief at Mensen met een Missie
summary:
Solid experience in fundraising, project development and project management in the field of Humanitarian Assistance combined with extensive experience in corporate communication and journalism, in functions like campaigner, spokesperson / press officer and freelance journalist.

For the last three years I have been the Confidential Counsellor at Terre des Hommes Netherlands (in Dutch: vertrouwenspersoon).

Self-motivated, a collaborative mind-set, autonomous when needed. Broad experience across several areas. Comfortable working in multicultural settings, fluent in six European languages. Happy to continue learning and evolving. 

My personal goal is to contribute with my engagement, knowledge and experience to a meaningful purpose, in fields like international cooperation, sustainability, conservancy.

Bel: 06 - 8200 3594
